page.title: List of the tallest statues in the United States

Line 16: Line 16:
|[[Statue of Liberty]] (''Liberty Enlightening the World'') || [[Liberty Island]], [[New York]] || 46 m || 151 ft || Stands upon a 47 m pedestal. 93 m (305 ft) total monument height.<ref>National Park Service, US Department of the Interior. http://www.nps.gov/archive/stli/prod02.htm</ref>, ''see article'' || 1886 || cast copper on metal armature || {{coord|40.6892|N|74.0445|W|type:landmark_region:US-NY|name=Statue of Liberty (New York)}} || [[Image:Majestic Liberty.jpg|75px|none]]
